/rejrrn: Not operational today (Cancelled by merchant) // Rejection // Alredy Refunded // Status Shared with RRN
rejrrn:
Hi XXXXXX,

Hope you are doing well

This email is regarding Order ID - XXXXXX from XXXXXX

We looked into the issue and this kind of service is completely unacceptable. We understand that your order wasn't delivered to you due to an operational issues.

We have noted your feedback and we will try to take every measure to prevent such incidents from recurring in the future.

In order to bridge the experience gap, we have initiated a refund INR XXXXXX from our end <<<mention date if added previously >>> and the amount typically reflects in the source account within 24-72 hrs based on your banking cycle. In case of any issue kindly contact your source bank (account) customer care.

Hope you order with us again to let us make up for this. We are constantly working on making your online ordering a hassle-free experience.

Best regards,
Team Zomato
nch: Calling Ticket // Non-Calling Hrs. // ON HOLD
/wdny:
Hi XXXXX,

Hope you are doing well.

This mail is for Order ID - XXXXXX from  [Restaurant Name].

We understand the frustration and inconvenience of receiving the wrong item, and we sincerely apologize for this oversight. We certainly never want our customers to face these kinds of issues.

We raised your concern with our restaurant partner, and they informed us that correct items were delivered to you. Having carefully evaluated the issue based on your complaint, we regret to inform you that we will not be able to proceed with a refund against your escalation. We encourage you to share a review on the restaurant page to help your fellow foodies make an informed choice to their liking.

If you have any further questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us.

Regards,
Team Zomato
rep: Please be informed that the prepration style and color of the food item and ingredients used may vary from the image displayed on the online menu as the items are made to order by the restaurant. The image shown on the restaurant page is for the purpose of presentation only however the actual item may differ from it.

/bogo:
Hi XXXXX,

Hope you are doing well.

This email is regarding Order ID - XXXXXX from XXXXXXX.

We completely understand how inconvenient this could be when the order is not delivered as per expectations. We certainly never want our customers to face these kinds of issues.

With regards to your concern, please be informed that to avail of the buy one gets one offer you need to select two items in your cart, and then as per the buy one gets one offer the next item value automatically less from your cart value. We can check that you have added only one item to your cart.

Unfortunately, we would not be able to compensate for this order from our end.

Rest assured that we constantly work towards providing you with a good experience.

Best regards,
Team Zomato

/gcard:
Hi XXXX,

Hope you are doing well.

This mail is regarding your gift order with order ID- XXXXXX from XXXXXXX

The gift recipient raised the concern and we called the recipient they have informed us that they have not received the gift card with the order.

A gift card is an e-card and no physical card will be sent. As soon as when you places a gift order for someone, an SMS will be sent to that customer along with a link. After clicking on the link, the gift card can be viewed for whom the order has been placed.

If you have any concerns, please reach out to us. We'll be happy to assist you.

Best regards,
Team Zomato

codtech:
Hi XXXXXX,

We hope this email finds you well.

We understand the trouble caused by the cash-on-delivery unavailability. With regard to your concern, please be informed we’re currently facing technical issues due to which the cash-on-delivery option has been disabled for a few users. Rest assured that we constantly work towards providing you with a good experience.

Best regards,

crydny:
Hi XXXXXX,

Hope you are doing well.

This mail is regarding your order:XXXXX with XXXXXXXXX.

We understand the trouble caused by the cancellation of order.

We would like to inform you that if the order gets canceled after acceptance, a cancellation charge is levied as the food is prepared.

Also, we checked that you were informed about the cancellation charges. Since this leads to food wastage for the restaurant, refund for this order won't be possible from our end.

Rest assured that we constantly work towards providing you with a good experience.

Best regards,
Team Zomato
